content.raw: Yeah, feel free to make a new issue for differing bottlenecks... the performance slowdown in my tests were so similar in both cases that I assumed it was due to the same underlying mechanism.  Is ogre rendering slowing down physics thread through coupling of the message transport system while gui is slowing physics down through a different mechanism?  (Seemed like the publish calls in Entity was the main culprit in both?).
content.html: Yeah, feel free to make a new issue for differing bottlenecks... the performance slowdown in my tests were so similar in both cases that I assumed it was due to the same underlying mechanism.
